avalancheActivity.highlights: Freeze thaw cycles recently have made the snow pack stable in most places

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow has melted considerably and the snow pack is considered stable in most places.

travelAdvisory.comment: In most places the old snow has subsided, hardend and considered stable in mutliple freeze and thaw cycles. New windslabs have formed in the east in the last few days but freezing level is expected to reach above mountain elevation on Tuesday and Wednesday with rain in high elevations. Snow becomes wet and chances of wet avalanche activity. Some new snow possible in the far north and west in high elevations on Thursday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The old snow has subsided in thaw and frost and is considered stable. Some new windslabs in the east after showers of snow in the last few days. Rain expected and wet avalanche activity.

weatherForecast.highlights: Áfram austlægar áttir, rigning með köflum og frekar hlýtt í veðri en styttiru upp og kólnar á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has melted or settled in most places and is considered generally stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It rained at high elevations in the beginning of the week and snow melted in many places. Small slabs could be present at high elevations on N-NE aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: In most places the old snow has subsided, hardend and considered stable in mutliple freeze and thaw cycles. New windslabs have formed in the east in the last few days but freezing level is expected to reach above mountain elevation on Tuesday and Wednesday with rain in high elevations. Snow becomes wet and chances of wet avalanche activity. Some new snow possible in the far north and west in high elevations on Thursday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The old snow has subsided in thaw and frost and is considered stable. Some new windslabs in the east after showers of snow in the last few days. Rain expected and wet avalanche activity.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlægar áttir næstu daga og einhver úrkoma á miðvikudag og fimmtudag og hlýtt í veðri. Kólnar og þurrt á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has melted or settled in most places and is considered generally stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Temperatures have been above freezing point in mountain elevation and froze again and the snow is considered stable and hard in most places.

travelAdvisory.comment: In most places the old snow has subsided, hardend and considered stable in mutliple freeze and thaw cycles. New windslabs have formed in the east in the last few days but freezing level is expected to reach above mountain elevation on Tuesday and Wednesday with rain in high elevations. Snow becomes wet and chances of wet avalanche activity. Some new snow possible in the far north and west in high elevations on Thursday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The old snow has subsided in thaw and frost and is considered stable. Some new windslabs in the east after showers of snow in the last few days. Rain expected and wet avalanche activity.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hlýnandi og dálítil úrkoma líkleg á miðvikudag  og fimmtudag og fellur sem snjór í hæstu fjöll en rigning neðar.  Kólnar á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Rain in mountian elevations on Wednesday and Thursday and increased chance of wet avalanche activity, especially were it rains in new windslabs. Older snow considered rather stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow becomes wet on Wednesday and Thursday with increased chance on wet avalanche activity. Older snow considered rather stable but wet avalaches are possible in the older snow aswell. Snow becoming more stable on Friday.

travelAdvisory.comment: In most places the old snow has subsided, hardend and considered stable in mutliple freeze and thaw cycles. New windslabs have formed in the east in the last few days but freezing level is expected to reach above mountain elevation on Tuesday and Wednesday with rain in high elevations. Snow becomes wet and chances of wet avalanche activity. Some new snow possible in the far north and west in high elevations on Thursday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The old snow has subsided in thaw and frost and is considered stable. Some new windslabs in the east after showers of snow in the last few days. Rain expected and wet avalanche activity.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austan og sunnan áttir næstu daga. Talsverð rigning, sem nær hátt til fjalla á miðvikudag og fimmtudag og hlýtt í veðri. Kólnar á föstuudag og styttir upp.
